item.title: The Jewish heritage of Thomas Matthew Crooks
item.description: Thomas Matthew Crooks was born in September 2003, making him 20 years old today. He resides with his parents, Matthew and Mary, who are in their 50s. The Crooks family is deeply religious and observes Jewish traditions and practices devoutly. Faith plays a significant role in their lives, guiding their values and shaping their worldview. Family Background Matthew Brian and Mary Elizabeth, the parents of Thomas, have a rich Jewish heritage passed down through their Scottish and English ancestry.
